name: Birthday
description:
Today is your birthday. We were going to celebrate your birthday, but we need a birthday cake. To make a birthday cake, we need six ingredients, water, milk, oil, eggs, flour, and strawberry.

Goal

The six ingredients needed to make a birthday cake is hidden within the game, find out all of them to win. Watch out for dangerous trap that kills you!

Controls

Press D or >(right arrow) to go right. 

Press A or <(left arrow)  to go left. 

Press space bar to jump. 

Press Z  to rewind your move.
